nodes.text: The Destruction of Bront occurred at some point before 0 ABY. The Galactic Empire committed atrocities on Bront that led to the destruction of the planet. Graf Yonna and his family lived on Bront by that time and only Graf survived the destruction. He later joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic as an agent for General Airen Cracken but he remained severely traumatized by the destruction of his homeworld.
